Key Match Events: Josh Hart recorded a triple-double with 15 points, 14 rebounds, and 12 assists.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mikal Bridges scored 27 points and OG Anunoby had 22 for the Knicks.
Others: Cam Payne replaced Jalen Brunson and finished with eight points and nine assists.
Jordan Clarkson and Collin Sexton each scored 25 for the Jazz, who lost their fifth straight.
